data.summary: The global AI market is valued at $391 billion in 2025, expanding at a CAGR of 35.9%. The industry is projected to grow fivefold by 2030, with 97 million people working in AI. 83% of companies prioritize AI, and 48% use it for big data, highlighting its rapid integration and economic impact[3].
bullets: Certainly! Since you used the placeholder "--topic," I'll select a trending and data-rich topic from the search results: **Artificial Intelligence (AI) in 2025**.
